scripts.build: tsup --entry src/index.ts --entry src/routes/nested.tsx --entry src/routes/parallel.tsx --entry src/routes/nested-transition.tsx --format esm,cjs --minify --dts --external react
scripts.dev: tsup --entry src/index.ts --entry src/routes/nested.tsx --entry src/routes/parallel.tsx --entry src/routes/nested-transition.tsx --format esm,cjs --watch --dts
scripts.publish-packages: rm -rf dist && pnpm build lint test typecheck && npm publish --access public --no-git-checks
